message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $9,500. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would you consider lowering the price to $8,500?
Bob, I understand you're trying to manage your budget, but $8,500 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $8,800. This is my final offer.
